js: var logs = []; async function init() { var saved = await api.getState(); if (saved) logs = saved; render(); } function render() { var body = api.root.querySelector('#log-body'); body.innerHTML = ''; var reversedLogs = logs.slice().reverse(); reversedLogs.forEach(function(log) { var tr = document.createElement('tr'); tr.innerHTML = '' + log.name + '' + log.p + '' + log.r + ''; body.appendChild(tr); }); } addLog = async function() { var name = api.root.querySelector('#exp-name').value; var p = api.root.querySelector('#exp-params').value; var r = api.root.querySelector('#exp-res').value; if(name && r) { logs.push({name: name, p: p, r: r}); await api.saveState(logs); render(); api.root.querySelector('#exp-name').value = ''; api.root.querySelector('#exp-params').value = ''; api.root.querySelector('#exp-res').value = ''; } }; init();
